Actions.Name: Rummage
Actions.Description: The collector goes through their collection to find something useful. Objects can be thrown at a space or character in range 6 as part of this action.

Rolls.Name: Arkentech Cube
Rolls.Description: Rapidly expands to creates a height 1 destructible object (10 HP). If created under a character, pushes them up.

Rolls.Name: Gaudy Hat
Rolls.Description: Put the gaudy hat on a character. A character wearing a hat is vulnerable+. If an attack hits that character, they can throw it at the attacker, forcing the attacker to wear it.

Rolls.Name: Demon Bone
Rolls.Description: Creates a pit. Characters that end their turn in the pit take 3 piercing damage.

Rolls.Name: Arkentech Portal Device
Rolls.Description: Creates two spaces, both within range 6 of each other. Characters can spend 1 space of movement to teleport from one to the other, as long as the other end is unoccupied.
